open.title: Vumatel Villages degraded service | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of degraded service affecting clients on the Vumatel villages network in Gauteng. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
